entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is trying to escape from danger.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend and companion of Harry's, who helps him try to Disapparate.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another friend and companion of Harry's, who is also trying to escape from danger.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are casting charms to prevent Harry and his friends from Disapparating.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Foul creatures that feed on human happiness and can sense fear in the vicinity.

relationships.description: Hermione is accompanying Harry as they try to Disapparate.
Ron is also accompanying Harry as they try to escape from danger.
